item.title: Study `ggplot2`
item.description: Day 1 Facetting Plot Geoms Adding a Smoother to a Plot Modifying the Axes Day 1 This is the self-study of ggplot2 book by myself. All this material are from the book of ggplot2. # Loading the package of ggplot2 library(ggplot2) # Read the data set 'mpg' mpg ## # A tibble: 234 x 11 ## manufacturer model displ year cyl trans drv cty hwy fl class ## <chr> <chr> <dbl> <int> <int> <chr> <chr> <int> <int> <chr> <chr> ## 1 audi a4 1.
